attributes.action: British to have Visa free access to their EU owned properties
attributes.additional_details:
Lobby the EU to give UK Citizens visa free access property that they purchased in the EU before Brexit - these were bought in good faith and this a human right.
European Court of Human Rights Article 1 Protocol 1.
attributes.background: Lobby the EU to give UK Citizens visa free access to their own property in the EU if purchased before Brexit - this a human right
